data.why:
Net::Telnet::Options - a module to respond to telnet options over
    any socket (socket-like object), using callbacks to notify the user
    of wanted options. Possibly: XML::Dtd - A module which parses,
    checks the integrity of a DTD, and can output a skeleton xml
    document from it (template or just plain XML). (Other features may
    follow)

    (Who is this 'we' that should know me? :) castaway on perlmonks,
    should anyone care..
